payload:
{
  "columnsSelection": {
    "mode": "ALL"
  },
  "explorationSampling": {
    "_refreshTrigger": 0,
    "selection": {
      "filter": {
        "distinct": false,
        "enabled": false
      },
      "latestPartitionsN": 1,
      "maxRecords": 10000,
      "maxRecordsForDisplay": -1,
      "ordering": {
        "rules": [],
        "enabled": false
      },
      "withinFirstN": -1,
      "partitionSelectionMethod": "ALL",
      "maxStoredBytes": -1,
      "targetRatio": 0.02,
      "maxReadUncompressedBytes": -1,
      "samplingMethod": "HEAD_SEQUENTIAL",
      "timeout": -1
    },
    "autoRefreshSample": false
  },
  "explorationFilters": [],
  "columnUseScientificNotationByName": {},
  "exploreUIParams": {
    "autoRefresh": true
  },
  "steps": [
    {
      "preview": false,
      "metaType": "PROCESSOR",
      "disabled": false,
      "type": "DateParser",
      "params": {
        "outCol": "",
        "formats": [
          "yyyy-MM-dd"
        ],
        "columns": [
          "purchase_date"
        ],
        "timezone_id": "UTC",
        "appliesTo": "SINGLE_COLUMN",
        "lang": "auto"
      },
      "alwaysShowComment": false
    },
    {
      "preview": false,
      "metaType": "PROCESSOR",
      "disabled": false,
      "type": "CurrencyConverterProcessor",
      "params": {
        "outputCurrency": "EUR",
        "inputCurrency": "USD",
        "isCurrencyFromColumn": false,
        "outputColumn": "purchase_amount_eur",
        "decimalNumber": 2,
        "refDateColumn": "purchase_date",
        "inputColumn": "purchase_amount",
        "dateInput": "COLUMN"
      },
      "alwaysShowComment": false
    },
    {
      "preview": false,
      "metaType": "PROCESSOR",
      "disabled": false,
      "type": "RoundProcessor",
      "params": {
        "mode": "ROUND",
        "places": 2,
        "columns": [
          "purchase_amount"
        ],
        "precision": 0,
        "appliesTo": "SINGLE_COLUMN"
      },
      "alwaysShowComment": false
    },
    {
      "preview": false,
      "metaType": "PROCESSOR",
      "disabled": false,
      "type": "TextSimplifierProcessor",
      "params": {
        "inCol": "product_title",
        "sortAlphabetically": false,
        "normalize": true,
        "language": "english",
        "clearStopWords": false,
        "stem": false
      },
      "alwaysShowComment": false
    },
    {
      "preview": false,
      "metaType": "PROCESSOR",
      "disabled": false,
      "type": "RegexpExtractor",
      "params": {
        "found_col": false,
        "extractAllOccurrences": false,
        "prefix": "apple",
        "column": "product_title",
        "pattern": "\\b(apple|macbook|ipad|iphone|ipod)\\b"
      },
      "alwaysShowComment": false
    }
  ],
  "maxProcessedMemTableBytes": -1,
  "previewMode": "ALL_ROWS",
  "vizSampling": {
    "_refreshTrigger": 0,
    "selection": {
      "useMemTable": false,
      "filter": {
        "distinct": false,
        "enabled": false
      },
      "latestPartitionsN": 1,
      "maxRecords": -1,
      "ordering": {
        "rules": [],
        "enabled": false
      },
      "withinFirstN": -1,
      "partitionSelectionMethod": "ALL",
      "targetRatio": 0.02,
      "maxReadUncompressedBytes": -1,
      "samplingMethod": "FULL"
    },
    "autoRefreshSample": false
  },
  "analysisColumnData": {},
  "columnWidthsByName": {
    "purchase_amount_eur": 158,
    "merchant_latitude": 143,
    "merchant_subsector": 183,
    "cardholder_age": 120,
    "merchant_id": 127,
    "reward_program": 155,
    "merchant_category_id": 165,
    "first_active_month": 150,
    "card_id": 120,
    "item_category": 113,
    "product_title": 300,
    "merchant_longitude": 150,
    "cardholder_fico_range": 173,
    "purchase_date_parsed": 190,
    "purchase_amount": 155,
    "cardholder_fico_score": 173,
    "signature_provided": 150,
    "id": 100,
    "purchase_date": 141,
    "authorized_flag": 128,
    "purchase_amount_": 135
  },
  "sorting": [],
  "globalSearchQuery": "",
  "coloring": {
    "scheme": "MEANING_AND_STATUS",
    "individualColumns": [],
    "valueColoringMode": "HASH"
  }
}
